posts.text: I am grateful that I can wake up this morning with air in my lungs, drink a warm cup of tea when I wake up, and have an amazing husband.

prompts.promptQ:
What is one thing that you are grateful for today?
Write 3-5 sentences about WHAT and WHY you are grateful for it.
You have one month off from work or school, and someone has handed you $100,000. Describe your dream traveling adventure!
What are the three main obstacles keeping you from doing the things you actually want to do with your time? Write 3-5 sentences exploring this predicament.
